alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 9:44PM MDT until March 31 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes I-25 through Raton Pass and Highway 64 through Capulin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will turn over to snow overnight. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
